# CommandTree

> One sidebar. Every task in your workspace.

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://commandtree.dev/docs/)

- [Task Discovery](https://commandtree.dev/docs/discovery/)

- [Task Execution](https://commandtree.dev/docs/execution/)

- [Configuration](https://commandtree.dev/docs/configuration/)
